DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , prospective registry clinical study evaluate real-world efficacy safety intra-arterial treatment acute ischemic stroke use Revive SE device basis standardise medical treatment .
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center , prospective , single-arm observational study evaluate real-world efficacy safety intra-arterial treatment acute ischemic stroke patient use Revive SE device basis standardise medical treatment.The device selection treatment base upon doctor blind protocol . The primary outcome reperfusion rate immediately intervention ( mTICI score ≥II b ) mRS Score 90 day intervention .
DOC.criteria: 1. age 18 year ; 2. clinical diagnosis acute ischaemic stroke ; 3. 6 hour onset ; 4 . IV tPA thrombolysis , need , start within 4.5 hour onset； 5 . Prestroke mRS ≤2 ; 6 . ICA/M1/M2/A1/A2/VA/BA occlusion confirm CTA/MRA/DSA ; ' 7. write informed consent form give 1. . history intracranial hemorrhage . 2. . life expectancy < 90 day ; 3. . history major surgery severe trauma past 10 day ; 4. . Uncontrolled hypertension ( define : SBP > 185mmHg DBP ≥110 mm Hg 3 continuous measurement interval least 10 minute confirm SBP > 185mmHg DBP ≥110 mm Hg ) 5. . PLT < 40*10^9/L； 6. . blood glucose ＜2.7mmol /L ＞22 . 2 mmol /L； 7. . concomitant use oral anticoagulation drug , INR > 3.0； 8. . ASPECTS score ≤5； 9. . conventional angiography indicate poor collateral circulation ( ACG Score ≤ 1 ) .
